page.title: 19Local Sport
page.content: Sport is well catered for locally in all three communities with first class facilities in each place. {Pontarddulais}has a Rugby Club which fields several teams every Saturday, as does{Hendy and Llangennech.}These teams have enjoyed success in the past years in the West Wales Rugby Union competitions and many of their players have gone on to play first class rugby. The three villages have cricket teams in the South Wales Cricket Association and employ professional cricketers as coaches. Tennis and bowls are also catered for with facilities at{Pontarddulais}and {Hendy. There is an open air pool at{Hendy}but for any competitive work, swimmers either have to go to Swansea, Llanelli or to the Penyrheol Leisure Centre at Gorseinon.
